name: webapp-weather
description: A ReactJS application on web to show weather of a particular city. This version uses [Halfmoon CSS Framework](https://www.gethalfmoon.com/) for styling and dark mode capabilities. For viewing the production version please visit the [master](https://github.com/humble-barnacle001/webapp-weather/tree/master) branch. For viewing the classic version please visit the [legacy](https://github.com/humble-barnacle001/webapp-weather/tree/legacy) branch.
